import axios from'axios';// Configuração do Axios
const api=axios.create({baseURL:process.env.NODE_ENV==='production'?'':'http://localhost:3001',timeout:10000,headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'}});// Services para o Dashboard
export const dashboardService={getSummary:()=>api.get('/dashboard/summary'),getOrdersPerDay:()=>api.get('/dashboard/orders-per-day'),getTopProducts:()=>api.get('/dashboard/top-products')};// Services para Clientes
export const clientService={getAll:()=>api.get('/clients'),getById:id=>api.get("/clients/".concat(id)),create:data=>api.post('/clients',data),update:(id,data)=>api.put("/clients/".concat(id),data),delete:id=>api.delete("/clients/".concat(id))};// Services para Produtos
export const productService={getAll:()=>api.get('/products'),getById:id=>api.get("/products/".concat(id)),create:data=>api.post('/products',data),update:(id,data)=>api.put("/products/".concat(id),data),delete:id=>api.delete("/products/".concat(id))};// Services para Pedidos
export const orderService={getAll:()=>api.get('/orders'),getById:id=>api.get("/orders/".concat(id)),create:data=>api.post('/orders',data),update:(id,data)=>api.put("/orders/".concat(id),data),delete:id=>api.delete("/orders/".concat(id)),updateStatus:(id,status)=>api.patch("/orders/".concat(id,"/status"),{status}),generatePDF:id=>api.get("/orders/".concat(id,"/pdf"),{responseType:'blob'})};export default{dashboardService,clientService,productService,orderService};
